scripts.compile-scss: node-sass --include-path scss src/scss/main.scss dist/css/pixl.css && npm run beautify-css && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-api: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/other/api-data.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/api.html
scripts.build-pwa: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/other/pwa-data.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/pwa.html
